TopicTitle: Lower altitude requirements for early Kerbin survey missions.

Articles.Content:
All of the early Kerbin survey missions have altitude requirements around 18km or higher.

The problem? A basic jet engine plane can't get that high, as far as I can tell. I have to use rockets to get above 12-13km.

I think these missions were balanced based on the old aerodynamics and engines where reaching 20km was easy, and they should be rebalanced around the new systems. Change the ~18kk thresholds to ~10km.
